intro.title: A dark shadow looms over are an already dangerous land, a hero must step up to guide these disunited lands to a new golden era
intro.introText: Welcome, brave adventurer, as you stand at the crossroads of destiny. The winds howl through the endless forest canopy like a chorus of ancient spirits, their whispers weaving a tale of forgotten lore and bygone heroes. It is an age of darkness, when every village is but a faint flicker in the vast expanse of night, yet it may also be an era of rebirth for those brave enough to forge a new path. The Celtic fantasy world of DarkForest beckons you with its mystical forests, ancient ruins, and mythical creatures - will you answer the call, or shall these young lands plunge into ruin?
intro.subtitle: You begin with 800 Choice Points, and 3 Skill Points, choose wisely

choices.title: Origin
choices.description: The tale of your birth & childhood.

options.title: Delarun - the Cave City
options.description: In the depths of the earth, the dwarven city of Delarun thrums with ancient power, its tunnels winding like veins through granite rock. Here, the stout-hearted folk forge their destiny amidst glittering crystals and precious metals. Yet beneath the surface, rival clans jostle for dominance in a struggle that echoes the very earth itself.

data.name: Delarun Lantern
data.desc: Famed for their compact size & brigth light, it is a token of your childhood

options.title: The Looming Spires
options.description: Here, pilgrims journey to honor the god of harvests, whose blessings have long nurtured the nearby forests through times of famine and plenty. But amidst this tranquility, a crisis brews - a bitter feud between neighboring monasteries over faith's finer points threatens to spill blood on sacred grounds, amid it's high walls the hermitage of Gorruk holds fast to its dwarven traditions, and religious fervor is beginning to boil over into petty squabbles and skirmishes!

options.title: Bennet's Rest
options.description: Bennet's Rest lies shrouded in darkness, once a beacon of nobility now mired by greed and tyranny. The ruling house of Aldhelm holds its subjects in an iron grip, siphoning off all prosperity for their own gluttonous desires. Yet beneath the yoke of oppression, the people of Bennet' rest find solace in their skill as horsemen - true messengers and warriors, cherished throughout the land, allowing this place to be one of the few safe from banditry

options.title: Dinnol Pits
options.description: Here desperate souls are devoured by brutal realities. A city of stone and despair, where every breath is tainted by the stench of death and desperation. Its only exports are the prisons that breed more suffering and the mercenaries forged in those very hells. Vices writhe like maggots in every festering wound, survival a cruel joke played on the downtrodden. The power trio rules with iron fist: the cunning Johnsons  - old bloodline of hustlers and gamblers, the red falcons  - a motley crew of orphaned thugs who recruit only from the most wretched, and the enigmatic Hlothere  - nobles in name and mask, pulling strings of power from behind their lavish facade. Survival here means knowing your place and your threats   - for in Dinnol pits, one misstep can mean a lifetime in those very prisons.

options.title: Fort Gorrot
options.description: Fort Gorrot stands like a crumbling behemoth on the precipice of a wild river, its very presence exuding an aura of darkness and decay. Once it was a mighty bastion of chivalry, but now it's a husk of what it once was - its glorious reputation sullied by the ambitions of Errant knights who sought fame in conquest rather than honor. And so we are left with High Chaplain Oswald guiding us through the wilderness of despair within those crumbling walls. Will his moral hand be strong enough to right the wrongs and unleash Fort Gorrot's full fury against a true enemy, or shall it's knight once again fall to greed.

options.title: Gorruk's Hermitage
options.description: High above the rest, a dwarven bastion stands steadfast against the tempestuous tides of darkness and chaos, its ancient stones impervious to the corrupting influences that plague the world below. Here Gorruk' s zealous followers hold fast to their unshakeable creed, their unwavering resolve illuminated by the beacon of truth. Should only the misguided heretics behold this radiant light, a harmonious kingdom of mortal and dwarf might yet be forged, sheltered from the looming shadows that threaten to engulf all. The call of Fort Eadharras beckons, though for Gorruk' s stalwart defenders it remains but a distant rumble in their ears, their gaze instead fixed upon the treacherous allurements of neighboring Looming Spires - a constant reminder of the perilous path they steadfastly avoid.

options.title: Lake Fardiir
options.description: Lake Fardiir's scattered settlements cling to the rocky shore like barnacles on an ancient wreck, their humble dwellings huddled together in meager defiance of the unforgiving waters. The lord of this dominion holds sway with an iron fist and a heart of stone   - his taxes draining the already meager resources, leaving the villagers to eke out a bare existence from the very earth they till and the fish that struggle through the lake's icy depths. Yet still they cling to their rugged way of life, sustained by tales of freedom and adventure passed down through generations of hardy stock   - dreams of rebellion kindling in the hearts of young men like embers waiting for a spark.

options.title: LandsKarn End
options.description: Once the site of epic conflict, Landskarn End now bears witness to humanity's struggle against the corrupting tendrils of the Dinnol pits' dark power. Here, those seeking refuge from such evil are met with the Inquisition's iron-fisted resolve  - a crusade aimed at purifying the soul through rigid moral standards and public shaming. Censors patrol the streets, scrutinizing every move and thought to identify transgressors whose names are subsequently etched in the town square's infamous register of shame. But beneath this fa√ßade of moral rectitude, an insidious underworld thrives  - a labyrinthine network of illicit vices that burrow deep into the darkest recesses of human heart and soul.

choices.title: Character Archetype
choices.description: The archetype from which your character descends

options.title: Human Hunter
options.description: Your rugged boots have traversed countless miles of wildwood, leaving nary a footprint but those of your prey. With quiver full of arrows at your back and trusty spear in hand, you stalk the shadows with stealth as quiet as night. Your knwledge of stealth and tracking was often employed by men of the law to aid in the search for outlaws.

data.name: Short Bow
data.desc: A hunter's shortbow, nimble and quick to fire

options.title: Human Warrior
options.description: You are a warrior forged in the crucible of combat, every scar and bruise telling the tale of your unwavering courage! Your armor bears the scars of countless battles, as does your heart. With sword at side and shield emblazoned with the emblem of your fallen comrades, you charge into fray like a storm unleashed upon the land! What legends will you forge in these untamed realms? Will it be one of valor, or perhaps of vengeance? The gods themselves seem to whisper tales of your exploits, don't they?. Your fearlessness in battle when destroying corrupted beasts of this land has made you an ally of those who stand aside the plane of death, granting you the capacity to speak the tongue of the deathwatch carrion crows.

data.name: Stout Shield
data.desc: A fine, hardy, shield, painted with family heraldry

data.name: Battle Axe
data.desc: A heavy, well balanced warriors axe, worn, but still to be greatly feared

data.name: Carrion Tongue
data.desc: The capacity to speak the tongue of crows

options.title: Human Wanderer
options.description: 'The Wanderer stands tall on the desolate plain, their worn leather boots planted firmly in the dusty ground as if rooted like an ancient tree. The weathered canvas backpack slung over their shoulder seems to blend seamlessly into the environment, its faded colors mimicking the hues of the sun-scorched earth and sky above. A wispy beard fringes their chin, a wild tangle of gray that speaks more of wisdom gained than age claimed. And yet, despite this rugged appearance, there is an air of quiet confidence about them - like a still pond reflecting the serenity of its surroundings, they exude tranquility deep within. But it's not just who they are or what they've seen that sets them apart, but also the staff in hand: a gnarled, twisted wood that seems to hum with a power as ancient and wild as the earth itself.

data.name: Strange staff
data.desc: An old runed staff, hums with the energy strange powers

options.title: Human Druid
options.description: The Human Druid stands tall amidst the ancient forest, their bare feet rooted to the earth like tree trunks, as they raise 'Moonstone Chimes' towards the lunar orb hanging low in the sky. The soft silver tones of the chimes seem to resonate in harmony with the moon's gentle light, bathing them in a soothing glow that invigorates and rejuvenates their very being. With each delicate note, they channel the full force of the lunar energy into their body, thus energised, they serve as a beacon to guide lost travelers through treacherous landscapes, shining brightly under moonlight like a celestial pathfinder. Following hidden lanes reserved only for those that know the old ways, the druid travels safetly, safe from any beast natural to the land

data.name: Moonstone Chimes
data.desc: Six crystal disks each etched with ancient runes, guide the way through the old forests

options.title: Dwarf Guardian
options.description: At the very threshold of the ancient stronghold stands mighty dwarf, resplendant in plate, his stalwart form a bulwark against the unknown dangers lurking beyond. His battle-worn armor glints like polished granite beneath the flickering torchlight, each plate etched with runes that whisper tales of unyielding bravery and unwavering duty. At shoulder height, he wields his trusty shield  - a behemoth of darkwood adorned with silver bolts and the emblem of the dwarven clans. Upon its surface, ancient wisdom is inscribed in letters as bold as the first stories told by firelight: 'Let none pass who do not bear honor in their heart.' A stern gaze from eyes like polished jet surveys all who approach, challenging them to prove their worthiness before the gates of old earth secrets. The very ground beneath his feet seems solidified into a testament of unshakeable resolve - and so too does he embody that unyielding spirit of dwarven resilience.

data.name: Plate Armor
data.desc: Forged from the earth itself. It is as solid as ancient stone and nearly impenetrable to even the most determined foe

data.name: Tower Shield
data.desc: A behemoth of darkwood adorned with silver bolts and the emblem of the dwarven clans. Rune carved.

options.title: Dwarf Scout
options.description: Striding across the battle-scarred plains like a living embodiment of his people's unyielding resolve. His dark beard flows behind him like a river of night, its braids woven with the silver threads of countless tales told and secrets kept. A mischievous glint in his eye hints at the assassin within  - one who can slip unnoticed into the shadows or strike swift and silent as a thunderclap. But it is also the diplomat's charm that opens doors, smooths ruffled feathers, and weaves alliances that will weather any storm of war. For Grimgold wears many hats and plays them all with equal aplomb: master of disguise, master of death, and master of negotiation  - a true Renaissance dwarf of old earth wit and cunning.

data.name: Poisoned Dagger
data.desc: A tiny but deadly instrument forged from the darkest depths of the mines. Its poison seeps into the wounds like bitter regret

options.title: Dwarf Cleric
options.description: Stepping forth with all the authority of ancient earth beneath his feet, eyes aglow like embers of eternal flame illuminate the face of this devout cleric, ever ready to defend the innocent or lead them in fervent song of praise. At his side hangs his sacred tome, the revered 'Chronicles of Deep Earth', the sacred tome of their people's history and spiritual traditions. His voice booms like thunder from the mountains, shaking the very foundations of those who hear it  - a true shepherd of old earth' s faithful.

data.name: Sacred Tome
data.desc: A leatherbound tome that was once held by a much revered prophet. Speaks of history and traditions

choices.title: Accursed Artifact
choices.description: Fate has found you, and placing upon your hands a boon and burden, this magical item sets your quest in motion, for within it, lies the fate of many.

options.title: Cloak of the Death Walker
options.description: The Cloak of the Death Walker is said to hold the power to bend reality, warping death into mere mortal inconvenience. It's as if the very fabric of existence were twisted and distorted within its worn leather folds. Wearers can manipulate time itself, stepping across the veil between life and death like a spectral waltzer gliding through realms unseen. But be warned - the cloak is said to exact a gruesome toll for every power it bestows, draining vitality with each step into the shadows of the unknown. Shall you don this macabre mantle, embracing the darkness within or will you succumb to its unfathomable hunger?

options.title: Blood-Forged Blade
options.description: The Blood-Forged Blade beckons its chosen wielder like a siren's fatal song  - an ornate dagger whose crimson-stained steel appears perpetually refreshed by some dark power. A constant reminder of its deadly promise, it calls out to its master with every beat of your heart, each whisper urging you back into the abyss from which it arose. It's holder must skirt the edges of madness as the under the moonlight the call of madness erupts, but for those who can withstand it's dark call are granted the power to step into the shadow realm, returning only at the cost of the taking of a mortal soul

data.name: Blood-Forged Blade
data.desc: Allows user to move as a hidden shadow, must kill to return, undermoonight the call of madness will strike at the will

options.title: Mirror of Deepsouls
options.description: The Mirror of Deepsouls - a reflection of your innermost thoughts, both blessing and curse in equal measure. It whispers secrets to those who seek wisdom, yet gazes back at you with cold, unforgiving judgment. Its power could be yours for the taking... or forever trapped within its silvery depths, a reminder of all your deepest fears and darkest desires. It's user can call forth the wisdom of their ancestor's but riskfalling to the desires of their predecessors

data.name: Mirror of Deepsouls
data.desc: Access to wisdom of ancestor's, but are pulled to their desires of their own

options.title: Pendant
options.description: The Pendant of Winter's Twilight glimmers with emerald green fire within its heart-shaped confines. Said to hold the essence of the frosty season, this icy charm can summon the most biting winter winds and plunge even the sunniest lands into frigid darkness. But be prepared for a terrible price - each time you wield its magic, your own vital warmth will slowly fade away like autumn leaves under winter's relentless grip. How far will you go to command the might of eternal ice? Or will you find yourself forever trapped in the cold, dark heart of winter's twilight?

options.title: Ruby
options.description: The Stone of All Hallows Eve radiates an otherworldly crimson glow. Legend has it that this ancient ruby holds the power to bend time itself, conjuring visions of past and present as if they were mere whispers in your ear. But beware, for with each glimpse into the vast tapestry of existence, you risk being consumed by the weight of countless lives lived and lost. Can you wield its power without succumbing to the crushing burden of all that has been? Or will you find yourself forever trapped within the swirling vortex of All Hallows Eve, reliving eternity's triumphs and tragedies?

options.title: Waterskin of Eternal Secrets
options.description: The Waterskin of Eternal Secrets holds within its worn leather walls a single sip of the fabled Pool of Whispers. Legend says that this enchanted water can grant the deepest insights into any mystery you choose to unravel - but at what terrible cost? With each quenching of your thirst, you risk unleashing a torrent of forgotten knowledge that could drive even the strongest mind to madness! Can you brave the dark depths of the waterskin's secrets, or will its power drown you in an ocean of unspoken truths?

choices.title: Threat
choices.description: Aquiring an accursed artifact has made you target for a great evil that has set it's sight upon you.

options.title: The Four Automatons
options.description: The Automatonic Werewolf stalks forth, its mechanical limbs moving with an unnatural, almost supernatural gait. Its metal fur rises as it senses your proximity, the very air charged with electric anticipation. The artifact is its quest; it's master has built it and three others only for the purpose of the return of his lost artifact, and they will stop at nothing, rebuilding themselves anew when broken, to return this favoured relic

data.name: The Four Automatons
data.desc: Four huge werewolf-like machines bent on the return of their lost artifact

options.title: The Ungark Trolls
options.description: The Ungark Trolls hunger for conquest is insatiable! Their very name strikes fear into the hearts of all who know them - violent, cruel, and strong. They crave more than just sustenance from the rich lands they've invaded; legend has it that a powerful artifact stolen from their ancient temple will seal their dominance forevermore, and their hunger for it's return drive's ever forward

data.name: The Ungark Trolls
data.desc: A tribe of conquering beasts, bent on returning their stolen artifact to their holy temple

options.title: The Haruspex
options.description: Behold! The haruspex, an embodiment of malevolent power in a twisted, gaunt frame. His eyes burn with a fire that can freeze blood and melt steel as he whispers his deadly intentions in a voice like a serpent's kiss. His very presence seems to suck the light from around him, leaving only darkness and despair in its wake. His prime desire, to gather powerful artifacts to his own collection, whispers have come to him of a device of incredible power, held within the darkwood groves.

data.name: The Haruspex
data.desc: A dark mage hungering for the magical artifact of old, it's voice corrupting and evil drains life from all that stand in his way

options.title: Erred-Mhuur
options.description: Erred-Mhuur, the merciless hunter! consumed by a maddening hunger to devour the very essence of all magical things, beast and relic alike. To aid in need to drain the magic from the world, it has twisted the form of its victim's into monstrous creations - dark, bloodthirsty shadows with glowing red runes that seem to burn brighter with every death they claim. It's malign influence spreads like a cancer through the land, corrupting all it touches. And now, within it's sight lies a magical artifact, a rich meal that would bring it to full power, and lay darkness upon the world

data.name: Erred-Mhuur
data.desc: Magical essence drainer, turns magical beasts into currupted shadows marked with runes, hunts for the artifact

options.title: The Red Vipers
options.description: The Red Vipers, a bandit group of untold dedication, held together by an unbreakable blood vow, they work togther to further their strength. Their leader, Woden the Blackhearted, has an insatiable thirst for power, whether my gathering more dispossed to his banner, or by acquiring an artifact of greath power, his will shall mark the land. Striking from the cold north, they have already massed a large base of powerful warriors, who now journey south, following the whispers of a relic of great power.

data.name: The Red Vipers
data.desc: A bandit group led by Woden the Blackhearted, hope to gain power by gather soldiers & acquiring a powerful artefact

options.title: The Whisperer
options.description: The tools of the dark god's where thought lost, but one, one has been recovered, and now lies in mortal hands. To these gods there is no greater threat, for this heresy they have sent the whisperer, a shadowed wanderer whose mere presence is to invite catastrophe. Disease, plagues, civil war all spread as he walks the earth, unwavering his calm stroll and silence a mere focal point from which the land plunges into darkness as it's searches for what mortal kind should not have. By his side stand the ghostly honor guard, three great warriors whose legends are known across the lands.

data.name: The Whisperer
data.desc: Paragon of despair, plunges all nearby into calamity, and aided by three ghostly, legendary warriors

choices.title: Items
choices.description: The right equipment can keep you alive when the tide turns against you.

options.title: Elixir of heaven's dew
options.description: A misty but radiant, honey colored brew infused with the essence of dawn flowers and blessed by the morning sun goddess. Drink deep and let healing energies course through your veins - the perfect remedy for those seeking to cheat mortal fate! Just be warned, it' might just leave you feeling a bit too peppy come nightfall.

data.name: Elixir of heaven's dew
data.desc: Honey potion, cures mortal wounds over 3 days

options.title: Mechanical Talisman
options.description: An ornate amulet that whispers ominous warnings to its wearer, telling it's user of approaching dangers and which direction they are coming. Of little use beyond a mile, and inaccurate beyond a hundred yards

data.name: Mechanical Talisman
data.desc: Indicates danger, and direction, though less accurate futher away, max range under a mile

options.title: Pouch of Holding
options.description: A mystical pouch whose volumetric limit is as elusive as a mirage on a desert of stone. As you stuff its sturdy canvas with an endless array of trinkets and treasures, it remains as compact and manageable as always - until, that fateful moment when your own weighty burden becomes mere child's play compared to the unyielding mass within.

data.name: Pouch of Holding
data.desc: A pouch of endless holding, if overpacked may suddenly break and weight it's true weight

options.title: Flaming Wand
options.description: A wand whose fiery inclinations know few bounds. With a flick of the wrist, it unleashes blazing tendrils to scorch the earth or dances of delicate flame patterns that warm the heart as much as they illuminate the dark. A true master of the arcane arts could harness its full fury and shape the very essence of fire itself

data.name: Flaming Wand
data.desc: Wand that controls flames, contains great power that can slowly be uncovered

options.title: Helm of Darksight
options.description: The Helm of Darksight reveals the hidden paths of night and darkness as clear as daylight. Darkness no longer hides it's secrets from you.

data.name: Helm of Darksight
data.desc: Grants nightvision

options.title: Direwolf Companion
options.description: By the moon's pale glow, behold Fenrir, stalwart companion and fierce protector. His coat as white as freshly fallen snow, his fur as black as the shadows he stalks, and those piercing blue orbs - windows to the soul of a true wolf. His loyalty is unshakeable as the ancient earth beneath our feet, his heart beating with the rhythm of the wild. Together you'll face whatever darkness lies ahead, side by side in the eternal dance of predator and prey.

data.name: Direwolf Companion
data.desc: Loyal direwolf companion, piercing blue eyes

options.title: Slumberwatch
options.description: Safeguard your rest with the soft glow of the Slumberwatch, its lantern light weaving a protective spell around your dreams like a lullaby sung by the stars themselves. Let it guard against the shadows and all their terrors as it casts a cozy circle of peace around you, a true haven from the unknown threats that lurk in the darkness. Your rest is its command, and so are you - free to dream without fear, ready for whatever adventures lie ahead.

data.name: Slumberwatch
data.desc: Protects you as you sleep

options.title: Token of the Ivy Lion
options.description: In your hand, a small piece of petrified wood bears an ancient image of the mighty Ivy Lion - a symbol of strength and resilience in times of need. The power of summoning this noble creature lies within, awaiting that moment when courage is called upon to conquer adversity. This wooden guardian will appear forth and protect you with it's life for the course of three hours

data.name: Token of the Ivy Lion
data.desc: Summon an Ivy Lion for three hours

options.title: Halberd of Thorns
options.description: Stand tall with the Halberd of Thorns, its razor-sharp barbs as unyielding as your resolve. This deadly instrument of war is said to pierce even the heart of darkness itself, when placed into the ground it can grow a wall of thorns four meters high and twenty wide, for one hour, allowing you to dictact the course of battle

data.name: Halberd of Thorns
data.desc: Once a day summon a wall of thorns of any shape, up to four meters high and twenty meters long, lasts one hour

options.title: Noble Steed
options.description: Mount up with nobility and pride, for this majestic steed is not just a horse but a symbol of your worth and stature  - its coat shimmering like the finest silver, mane flowing like the golden sun. Its strength echoes the power within you as it gallops across the land, leaving all else in its regal wake. Ride into battle with honor and dignity at your side!

data.name: Noble Steed
data.desc: A beautiful horse, swift and brave

options.title: Sword of Homing
options.description: Wield the Sword of Homing, that trusty companion which always finds its way back to your hand as surely as fate guides you through life's labyrinth   - no matter where you roam. Its light returns to you like a beacon in times of need, and so shall your path be illuminated with purpose

data.name: Sword of Homing
data.desc: Can be recalled to return to your hand, it will cut through all it can to return

options.title: Tome of Binding
options.description: Unlock the Tome of Binding, that ancient book of spells which holds the power to bind both body and soul  - a true masterclass in arcane control. With every turn of its yellowed pages, you'll weave chains of reality as unbreakable as your resolve. A book full of powerful physical spells like the flying chains and spiders web, once three spells are committed to memory, al other spells will leave it's pages.

data.name: Tome of Binding
data.desc: A book of spells once three are learnt, all others will disappear

choices.title: Allies
choices.description: Brothers sworn to your side, and who can be called upon in times of trouble

options.title: Ragnar 'Thunderhammer' Erifson
options.description: A gruff, battle-scarred dwarf with a heart of gold beneath his prickly exterior! When he lets loose with his trusty warhammer, the very earth shakes and giants tremble - but only after he's had his morning ale and a good belly laugh! A loyal ally to count on in the heat of battle. Just don't get him started on his least favorite topic: bards. The mere mention sends him stomping off in a huff, muttering something about 'too many notes'.

data.name: Ragnar 'Mad Axe' Erifson
data.desc: A quiet man, quick to a powerful beserker rage. +cats, -bards

options.title: Karrick 'Steel' Olborn
options.description: A foul-mouthed human with a penchant for causing chaos! His battle tactics are as unpredictable as his next hangover, leaving enemies reeling from one wild swing to the next. Though his strategies may not always succeed... they never fail to entertain! Just don't expect him to lend you any of his famous 'Riot's Revenge' ale after a long day of pillaging - unless you're buying! As for romance, he has a soft spot for curvaceous beauty and isn't afraid to show it.

data.name: Karrick 'Steel' Olborn
data.desc: Grumpy dwarven drunkard, cunning, if dangerous planner. +chubby ladies, -sheriffs

options.title: Dwarven Mercenaries
options.description: Dwarven Mercenaries, sturdy as the mountains they hail from! Their loyalty is a precious commodity, but don't forget to grease their palms with gold or gems every now and then. With their axes at your side, you're sure to conquer any battle that comes your way - just be prepared for them to disappear when the pay runs out!

data.desc: Four strong warriors who are loyal as long as they are paid

options.title: Killborn the Bear
options.description: A grizzled, battle-scarred bear with a coat as black as coal and eyes that burn like hot coals in his head. His fur is matted and tangled, with streaks of dried blood running through it like veins on a rock. A deep scar runs from his cheek to his jawline, giving him an perpetually snarled expression. He's the size of a small boulder, with muscles rippling beneath his thick hide as he moves. His roar can be heard for miles and his paws can crush a man like an insect. But despite all his intimidating features, there's something almost endearing about him. Maybe it's his goofy grin or the way he always seems to find joy in the simplest things. Whatever it is, Killborn is my trusted ally and friend - even if he does sleep most of the day away.

data.name: Killborn the Bear
data.desc: Scarred bear you raised from a cub, sleeps a lot

data.name: Bear Speech
data.desc: The capacity to speak the tongue of bears

options.title: Forest Rangers
options.description: A trio of deadly forest hunters who track their prey with eyes that pierce through darkness and silence like ghosts. Their faces are as rugged as the bark on ancient trees, their bodies honed from generations of living off the land. They move as one, a silent symphony of death, their bows singing in perfect harmony as they stalk their quarry across the forest floor. There's Akira with his eyes of pure wisdom and hair that flows like leaves, there's Thalia with her sharp wit and deadly aim, and then there's Zara - the youngest but deadliest of them all. Together, they're a force to be reckoned with, a true terror of the wild woods. With their skills at our side, no foe can hide from us for long.

data.desc: Trio of forest hunters

options.title: Olana the Wild Mage
options.description: A whirlwind of unpredictable power, unleashing elemental fury with every step she takes and every word she speaks! Her hair crackles with electricity as storm clouds gather around her. Leaves and vines sprout from her very pores, wrapping her in a living, breathing cocoon that seems to grow more chaotic by the moment. With each gesture, she summons the raw force of nature - lightning bolts flashing across the sky, tornadoes spinning up from dust devils, or waves crashing against the shore. Her magic is wild and untamed, leaving destruction in its wake but also offering hope for a desperate world that needs such unbridled power to counterbalance the darkness.

data.name: Olana the Wild Mage
data.desc: Unstable nature magic caster

options.title: Kevan the Dark blade
options.description: Kevan the Dark Blade? A master of stealthy misdirection, always lurking just out of sight as he whips his deadly blades around with a deadly grace. His dark hair is slicked back, revealing his sharp features and piercing green eyes that seem to bore into your very soul. He wears black leather armor adorned with intricate silver filigree  - the perfect blend of style and function for any mission. And don' forget those razor-sharp blades at his hips! With Kevan on our side, we can strike from the shadows or take aim as an expert marksman. His arsenal includes all manner of deadly poisons and traps to catch our enemies off guard.

data.name: Kevan the Dark blade
data.desc: Rogue and archer, master of poisons

options.title: Lady Heraldia
options.description: A radiant beacon of hope in the darkest of times, her healing powers coursing through your veins like warm sunlight on a cold winter's day. She wears ornate silver robes adorned with symbols of her faith, her long golden hair flowing like a river of wisdom down her back. Her eyes are pools of pure compassion and her smile can light up an entire room  - or lift the spirits of an entire army. With her staff in hand, she summons the divine to mend wounds and fortify defenses. But don't underestimate her defensive prowess! She can conjure walls of holy flames to block your enemies' path or summon celestial guardians to protect you from harm. Lady Herladia is a shining star in our quest for justice  - may her healing light never fade.

data.name: Lady Heraldia
data.desc: Cleric healer and defensive caster

choices.title: Skills
choices.description: You are no ordinary man, your training has developed within you rare skills.

options.title: Arcane Shielding
options.description: Block spells at great expense to your fatigue, creating shields that burst from your hands

data.name: Arcane Shielding
data.desc: Create magic shields with hands, costs fatigue

options.title: Druidic Shapeshifter
options.description: You have the capacity to change your form into that of a wolf or a bear

data.name: Shapeshift
data.desc: Shapeshift between wolf and bear

options.title: Sleight of hand
options.description: Your hands are masters of misdirection, tricks and surprise, none can guess what lies beneath their sleeves, and no lock can stop them

data.name: Sleight of hand
data.desc: trickery & lockpicking

options.title: Mind Reading
options.description: unlock secrets and unravel mysteries within others' minds

data.name: Mind Reading
data.desc: unlock secrets and unravel mysteries within others' minds

options.title: Telekinesis
options.description: Ethereal hands summoned by your mind allow you to manipulate the world within twenty meters

data.name: Telekinesis
data.desc: manipulate the world within twenty meters

options.title: Barbarian's Roar
options.description: Strike fear into beast and man alike with your fearsome call to battle

data.name: Barbarian's Roar
data.desc: Strike fear into beast and man alike

options.title: Camouflage
options.description: Blend seamlessly into your surroundings like a leaf on a tree, becoming nearly invisible in the wild.

data.name: Camouflage
data.desc: Blend seamlessly into your surroundings like a leaf on a tree, becoming nearly invisible in the wild.

options.title: Nature's Voice
options.description: Speak in harmony with the creatures of the wild, finding allies and information in the forest's deepest paths.

data.name: Beast Tongue
data.desc: The capacity to speak the tongue of beasts

options.title: Clay Clone
options.description: Draw clay from the earth, creating an illusory copy of yourself that last's a whole day

data.name: Clay Clone
data.desc: Use clay to create illusory copy of self, lasts a day

options.title: Drain Life
options.description: Through your hands you can drain another of life, healing yourself, but be careful such dark magic is taboo in all corners of society

data.name: Drain Life
data.desc: Taboo, drain life through hands, healing self
